articles.title: Soccer-Venezuela coach resigns two weeks before World Cup qualifiers
articles.description:
Venezuela soccer coach Jose Peseiro has resigned his position at the national team two weeks before crucial World Cup qualifiers after alleging he and his backroom staff had not been paid on time.
The Portuguese former coach of Sporting and Porto, who took over in February 2020, had been due to lead Venezuela at home to Argentina on Sept.

articles.title: Peseiro Quits As Venezuela Coach Before World Cup Qualifiers
articles.description: CARACAS: Jos Peseiro quit as Venezuela head coach on Friday, just two weeks ahead of the national teams South American World Cup qualifiers against Argentina, Peru and Paraguay.
articles.content:
CARACAS: Jos Peseiro quit as Venezuela head coach on Friday, just two weeks ahead of the national teams South American World Cup qualifiers against Argentina, Peru and Paraguay.

articles.title: Rugby-Boks just want to play says Kolisi after NZ COVID-19 restrictions
articles.description: South Africa have not let the uncertainty over the future of this year’s Rugby Championship sparked by New Zealand's stricter COVID-19 regulations affect them ahead of Saturday’s second clash against Argentina, captain Siya Kolisi said on Friday.

articles.title: Brazil in talks with Argentina for gas pipeline from Vaca Muerta - Bolsonaro
articles.description: Brazil is negotiating with Argentina on the construction of a billion-dollar pipeline from the Vaca Muerta shale gas reserves, Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro said on Thursday.

articles.title: Soccer-Pochettino leaves open possibility of Messi debut at Brest
articles.description: There is a very good feeling." Messi had not trained for a month after steering Argentina to the Copa America title with a 1-0 win over rivals Brazil in the final. Having won 10 LaLiga and four Champions League titles during his 17-year career at Barcelona, Messi left them on a free transfer after the Catalan club's president Joan Laporta said they could no longer afford to keep him.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi may be in the Paris St Germain squad for their Ligue 1 visit to Brest on Friday, manager Mauricio Pochettino said but he remained tight-lipped on whether the six-times Ballon d'Or winner would finally make his debut.

articles.title: Spotify brings Music + Talk audio format to more than a dozen countries
articles.description: Starting this week, Music + Talk is available in 15 new markets across Europe, Latin America and Asia: Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, France, Germany, India, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, Philippines, Spain, and Sweden.

articles.description: In fact not only the 'original' tissue paper was put up for sale, but also replicas of it are currently being sold online in Argentina.
